meta.title: ILLA Cloud Integrations
meta.description: ILLA integrates dozens of data sources and provides a very simple data connection method, which can connect to databases or APIs such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Hugging Face.

header.title: Connect to any data source
header.description: With the ability to connect to mainstream databases or any data connected through APIs, ILLA Cloud allows developers to tightly integrate data obtained from the back-end with front-end components. This enables developers to easily write data calls and achieve extensive information interaction by adding resources and actions to response to user events.

meta.title: ILLA Cloud Components
meta.description: ILLA provides a range of commonly used front-end development components, enabling users to easily build front-end interfaces and respond to user actions and display data through simple drag-and-drop operations. In addition, users can construct complex components such as tables, charts, forms, lists, and more through the platform. This simple approach empowers users to effortlessly create complex components.

header.title: Library of built-in components
header.description: ILLA provides a range of commonly used front-end development components, enabling users to easily build front-end interfaces and respond to user actions and display data through simple drag-and-drop operations. Users can construct complex components such as tables, charts, forms, lists, and more through ILLA.

feature.label: feature
feature.title: What sets ILLA Cloud apart from others?
feature.description: ILLA Cloud's SQL Generate feature and JavaScript freedom, along with its seamless integration with databases and APIs, make it an efficient tool for developers building internal tools with drag-and-drop components in real time.
feature.item-1-description: With the embedded Chatgpt Plugin, you can input natural language and get SQL statements that can be run directly.
feature.item-2-description: We provide developers JavaScript freedom by wrapping JS statements with {{Template Syntax}} to add variety to the output.
feature.item-3-description: ILLA Cloud connects to databases and APIs, and integrates back-end data with front-end components, simplifying data calls for massive information interaction.
feature.item-4-description: ILLA turns imagination into real code and designs with real-time collaboration in ILLA Builder, improving development efficiency.
feature.item-5-description: ILLA Builder's dozens of components can be dragged and dropped, saving time and boosting developer productivity.

template.label: Templates
template.title: What can you build with ILLA?
template.description: ILLA Cloud offers a variety of components, such as tables, charts, forms, lists, etc. Users can easily build dashboards, admin panels, survey forms, and more using these components.
template.item-1-description: Use tables and charts to create a dashboard.
template.item-2-description: Use form and input components to create form apps.
template.item-3-description: Use a list component to display and manage information.
